    Spectral Indices by Type¶

    Vegetation¶

    Vegetation Spectral Indices¶

    short_name

    long_name

    reference

    ARVI

    Atmospherically Resistant Vegetation Index

    https://doi.org/10.1109/36.134076

    BNDVI

    Blue Normalized Difference Vegetation Index

    https://www.indexdatabase.de/db/i-single.php?id=135

    CIG

    Chlorophyll Index Green

    https://www.indexdatabase.de/db/i-single.php?id=391

    CVI

    Chlorophyll Vegetation Index

    https://www.indexdatabase.de/db/i-single.php?id=391

    EVI

    Enhanced Vegetation Index

    https://doi.org/10.1016/S0034-4257(96)00112-5

    EVI2

    Two-Band Enhanced Vegetation Index

    https://doi.org/10.1016/j.rse.2008.06.006

    GARI

    Green Atmospherically Resistant Vegetation Index

    https://www.indexdatabase.de/db/i-single.php?id=363

    GBNDVI

    Green-Blue Normalized Difference Vegetation Index

    https://www.indexdatabase.de/db/i-single.php?id=186

    GEMI

    Global Environment Monitoring Index

    https://www.indexdatabase.de/db/i-single.php?id=25

    GLI

    Green Leaf Index

    https://www.indexdatabase.de/db/i-single.php?id=375

    GNDVI

    Green Normalized Difference Vegetation Index

    https://www.indexdatabase.de/db/i-single.php?id=401

    GRNDVI

    Green-Red Normalized Difference Vegetation Index

    https://www.indexdatabase.de/db/i-single.php?id=185

    GVMI

    Global Vegetation Moisture Index

    https://www.indexdatabase.de/db/i-single.php?id=372

    MNDVI

    Modified Normalized Difference Vegetation Index

    https://www.indexdatabase.de/db/i-single.php?id=245

    MNLI

    Modified Non-Linear Vegetation Index

    https://doi.org/10.1109/TGRS.2003.812910

    NDVI

    Normalized Difference Vegetation Index

    https://doi.org/10.1016/0034-4257(79)90013-0

    NGRDI

    Normalized Green Red Difference Index

    https://www.indexdatabase.de/db/i-single.php?id=390

    NLI

    Non-Linear Vegetation Index

    https://doi.org/10.1080/02757259409532252

    OSAVI

    Optimized Soil-Adjusted Vegetation Index

    https://doi.org/10.1016/0034-4257(95)00186-7

    RVI

    Ratio Vegetation Index

    https://doi.org/10.2134/agronj1968.00021962006000060016x

    SARVI

    Soil Adjusted and Atmospherically Resistant Vegetation Index

    https://doi.org/10.1109/36.134076

    SAVI

    Soil-Adjusted Vegetation Index

    https://doi.org/10.1016/0034-4257(88)90106-X

    SeLI

    Sentinel-2 LAI Green Index

    https://doi.org/10.3390/s19040904

    VARI

    Visible Atmospherically Resistant Index

    https://doi.org/10.1016/S0034-4257(01)00289-9

    Burn¶

    Burn Spectral Indices¶

    short_name

    long_name

    reference

    BAI

    Burned Area Index

    https://digital.csic.es/bitstream/10261/6426/1/Martin_Isabel_Serie_Geografica.pdf

    BAIS2

    Burned Area Index for Sentinel 2

    https://doi.org/10.3390/ecrs-2-05177

    CSIT

    Char Soil Index Thermal

    https://doi.org/10.1080/01431160600954704

    NBR

    Normalized Burn Ratio

    https://www.indexdatabase.de/db/i-single.php?id=53

    NBRT

    Normalized Burn Ratio Thermal

    https://doi.org/10.1080/01431160500239008

    NDVIT

    Normalized Difference Vegetation Index Thermal

    https://doi.org/10.1080/01431160600954704

    SAVIT

    Soil-Adjusted Vegetation Index Thermal

    https://doi.org/10.1080/01431160600954704

    short_name

    long_name

    reference

    Modified Normalized Difference Water Index

    https://doi.org/10.1080/01431160600589179

    NDWI

    https://doi.org/10.1080/01431169608948714

    short_name

    long_name

    reference

    NDSI

    Drought¶

    Drought Spectral Indices¶

    short_name

    long_name

    reference

    NDDI

    Normalized Difference Drought Index

    https://doi.org/10.1029/2006GL029127

    NMDI

    Normalized Multi‐band Drought Index

    https://doi.org/10.1029/2007GL031021

    Kernel¶

    Kernel Spectral Indices¶

    short_name

    long_name

    reference

    kEVI

    Kernel Enhanced Vegetation Index

    https://doi.org/10.1126/sciadv.abc7447

    kNDVI

    Kernel Normalized Difference Vegetation Index

    https://doi.org/10.1126/sciadv.abc7447

    kRVI

    Kernel Ratio Vegetation Index

    https://doi.org/10.1126/sciadv.abc7447

    kVARI

    Kernel Visible Atmospherically Resistant Index

    https://doi.org/10.1126/sciadv.abc7447
